name: Project ATARAXIA Demo
description:
In the game you play as (nameable MC) who has finished out high school but aslo while carrying the grief of his best friend after she died in a tragic accident a few years prior. Everything is going fine up until her long forgotten father reappears out of no where telling him that she's still alive. And just as quickly as it happened MC is forcibly pulled into another world to save his friend.

Only the first Episode is available to play in this demo. There is a planned steam demo that will be much higher quality and will resemble the final product.

DISCLAIMER!!!

I am aware that the game is a bit... meh, presentation wise. I'd prefer if you see this game as more of a visual novel than an RPG. Also sorry if the writing gets kind of cringe sometimes. My writing style changed a lot from when I first started.

Controls

Z: Confirm

X: Back/Cancel

Space: Skip/ Fast Forward (can break certain cutscenes via audio un-syncing)

WASD or arrow controls

saving freely will not be a feature in  the full game

lol
